title: Solo/Duo Queue is coming... "Very Soon"™
body:
EDITL: ITS OUT BOYS, WE DID IT! 

How long do you guys think it will take for Solo Queue? It's already out on the Garena server (source: reddit). It was planned for the 16th on the Oce server, however with Flex Q problems, it was updated to "Very Soon"™. Other servers have been told it will definitely come on this patch (6.22), even though they said it going to be released within a week. 

So let's guess and see how long "Very Soon"™ means in Riot's standards, Please Vote!

replies.body:
Oh man only two votes for Nov 18th. It was "Very Soon" guys, not "Soon™" :P

Appreciate your patience. Enjoy!
Wake up nigg*a* WAKE UP. We out here

Rito Response:

"We are sorry to say, that we will not be releasing Solo Que this season or this year.

Unfortunately there was some miscommunication between riot employees and tencent, tencent has told us we have to appeal to the filthy casuals and thus can't have a Solo/Duo Queue.

But we hope to convince them Soon ™"
